name: Spookermarket
description:
The goal is simple, collect your groceries and get out...

As you wander through the aisles, you may notice something lurking behind the shelves. You must stay alert and keep moving if you want to get out of the grocery store alive. Whatever's in there with you is deadly.

The items you need to collect are scattered throughout the store, and you must get familiar with the store layout in order to find them quickly. But be careful not to linger too long in any one place, or whatever's in there with you might catch you.

The shopping list is randomly generated each time you play, so no two games will ever be the same.

As time ticks away, the tension builds, and the demon grows more aggressive. If you don't collect all five items before the timer runs out, good luck. You better be quick if you want to make it out alive.

Be warned, this is not a game for the faint of heart.
